comments.body: Minor nit: add a blank line above and below this function.

fwiw this test is written in a very confusing way (calling a closure with a closure and so on). Try printing out the code and then drawing lines showing the code flow -- it jumps up and down and up and down a bunch of times.

It would be clearer if there were no closures, maybe by making a stateful widget that wraps the behaviour you're testing (what is currently in the closure you pass to `test`, except using State instead of a StatefulBuilder).
